title: Claim Extraction Schema
description: Canonical schema for AI-extracted claim data. All fields are optional. AI returns null for unknown values.

lossDate.description: The date the loss occurred (YYYY-MM-DD format). Must be a specific date, not a range.

lossLocation.description: The address or location where the loss occurred.

lossDescription.description: A factual description of what happened.

propertyAddress.description: The address of the damaged property (if different from loss location).

estimatedDamageAmount.description: A dollar amount mentioned in the document (not calculated by AI).

contactPhone.description: Phone number mentioned in the document.

contactEmail.description: Email address mentioned in the document.

involvedParties.description: Names of individuals or entities mentioned in the document.
